job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology or related field.

jd: Job Description -Please Send Candidates Local to Illinois DATASTAX /CASSANDRA DBA - Hybrid Client: A Ecommerce companyLocation: Chicago ILLINOIS – HybridDuration: 6 months (C2H )GC/USC onlyMOI: Video Must Have - 12+ years of experience in IT 5+ years of experience in DataStax/Cassandra is a MUST!Note - Previous Candidate was rejected because his major experience was in SQL Server DBA domain, not really Cassandra DBA. Please Send Candidate with Strong Cassandra Experience DATASTAX/CASSANDRA DBA POSITION’S QUALIFICATIONS: • Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology or related field.• Proficient in one or more Database Management Systems (e.g. DB2i, DB2 LUW, DataStax, Oracle, SQL Server).• Familiar with one or more replication technologies (e.g. DTShare, CDC, SQL Replication, Attunity).• Ability to read a Logical Data Model a plus.• Excellent verbal and written communication skills.• Detail oriented. Can juggle multiple priorities.• Strong analytical, problem-solving ability.• May require travel to branch locations.• Regular and reliable attendance.• Certifications are a PLUS.
